actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to guarantee to each employee in the competitive service who has completed the probationary or trial period, the right to a hearing, a hearing transcript, and all relevant evidence prior to a final decision of any agency to take certain action against such an employee.
short_title: Federal Employee Administrative Hearing Rights Guarantee Act

summary.text: Federal Employee Administrative Hearing Rights Guarantee Act - Provides for each employee in the competitive service of the Federal Government who has completed the probationary or trial period, the right to a hearing, a hearing transcript, and all relevant evidence prior to a final decision of an agency to remove or suspend without pay such employee. Sets forth procedures for implementing the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: Federal Employee Administrative Hearing Rights Guarantee Act

A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to guarantee to each employee in the competitive service who has completed the probationary or trial period, the right to a hearing, a hearing transcript, and all relevant evidence prior to a final decision of any agency to take certain action against such an employee.
